summary: The famous Cloaks of Skyrim Mod by Nikinoodles is now available in German.
descriptionHtml:
I really enjoyed the Cloaks of Skyrim mod and liked it so much, that i thought, my German fellows would like a German version of it. I wrote Noodles but got no answer, so i think, his permission line is ok with this. If he wants me to put it down, i will do that.

You still need the original Cloaks of Skyrim Mod. (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?)

Just copy my ESP. over the old one.
author: Tyberion
